snippet.title: Crazy Planets by Playfish
snippet.description:
Play now at http://apps.facebook.com/crazyplanets

Ever watched a movie where the evil space emperor is thwarted by the forces of good and thought to yourself "I could SO have done a better job of that evil space empire"? Ever looked up at the stars and wondered what it might be like to explore all those mysterious worlds -- and then plunder them for all the crystals and precious metals they're worth so you can buy more cool stuff for your home planet? Ever considered what it might be like to recruit your friends on a space trip to the moon -- and then blow it to smithereens?

If the answer to any of those questions is an evil laugh then Crazy Planets is the game you've all been waiting for!
